comment.author: 33108729@N02
comment._content:
My dear friends, I would like to express my warmest thanks to all of you, making an effort to share this wealth of culture and history, and make it accessible for a community like this. It then becomes a part of a larger collective consciousness and our united world heritage..

All the best with the continuation of your work and blessings from Sweden. I also hope that that the difficult weather conditions will be kind to you all! 

Stefan

comment.author: 23967260@N07
comment._content: Very nice pic! Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Traditional world's costumes, and we'd love to have this added to the group! Thanks.
